title: map_to_base
description: Maps an image or surface from a time point directory (either cross-sectional or longitudinal) to the base space and outputs it in the appropriate base directory.

output_long_mri.title: Output Longitudinal MRI
output_long_mri.description: Output in base/mri directory when mapped from a longitudinal directory.

output_long_surf.title: Output Longitudinal Surface
output_long_surf.description: Output in base/surf directory when mapped from a longitudinal directory.

output_cross_mri.title: Output Cross-sectional MRI
output_cross_mri.description: Output in base/mri directory when mapped from a cross-sectional directory.

output_cross_surf.title: Output Cross-sectional Surface
output_cross_surf.description: Output in base/surf directory when mapped from a cross-sectional directory.
